instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 16 inch with funny issues
threads.message:
Good day guys .

Have got a 16 inches with a very funny behaviour: the machine powers and boots fine with the rich bar on but no display, however when I performed a “ REVIVE /RESTORE “ through DFU, the  display will work again until I restart, then it stops working, when I perform the procedure, it starts working again, until I restart same issue:: I have no idea where to begin , please help guys

threads.title: 16 inch with funny issues
threads.message:
SMC reset doesn't help, instead of DFU?
This happens with good battery alone too?

threads.title: 16 inch with funny issues
threads.message: Even on a different shell, it does the same thing

threads.title: 16 inch with funny issues
threads.message:
So SMC reset doesn't help?

External video and USB activity still present, when lose internal video?
